articles.title: Uddhav Thackeray Has Lost Majority, Must Face Floor Test: BJP To Governor
articles.description: The tussle for Maharashtra moved into its final phase on Wednesday, with the BJP telling the Governor that Chief Minister Uddhav Thackeray has lost majority in the assembly and a floor test is in order. The Governor is yet to respond on the issue.
articles.content: <li>The BJP's Devendra Fadnavis, who led the party delegation for the meet with Governor Bhagat Singh Koshyari, said: "We have written to the Governor and told him that Shiv Sena's 39 MLAs are repeat… [+2404 chars]

articles.title: Udaipur: Citing Prophet ‘insult’, 2 kill man on video, threaten PM Modi

articles.title: Decoded: In Shinde faction, 15 Sena MLAs are turncoats
articles.description: The Shinde camp has claimed that they have issue with the alliance with the Congress and the NCP. But, of the 39 legislators in Shinde faction, 15 MLAs are not originally from the Shiv Sena.
